name="CODE">Vec3 startPosition = entity.getEyePosition(1f); // Get the entity's eye position.&#10;Vec3 direction = entity.getViewVector(1f).scale(25); // Get the view vector and scale it by 25.&#10;targetPosition = startPosition.add(direction); // Add the scaled vector to the start position.</field><next><block type="additions_spawn_entity"><field
